creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: diamond shaped picture plane; brown lumpy forms at bottom; grid with purple lines at left; shaded blue sky-like ground at right with vertical wavy white lines; yellow glow above brown forms at right
markings: below image in pencil: 3/15 | LRC stamp: KENJI NAKAHASHI / NEW YORK
medium: Etching and aquatint with hand-coloring on paper
signed: below image in pencil: \"life full of changes\" / K. Nakahashi | LRC in pencil: 1978
title: Life Full of Changes
